questions.questionText: Find the odd one: B, D, F, J
questions.explanation: B (2), D (4), F (6) are at even positions with gap of 2. J (10) breaks the pattern - should be H (8).

questions.questionText: Find the odd one: Rose, Lotus, Jasmine, Potato
questions.explanation: Rose, Lotus, and Jasmine are flowers. Potato is a vegetable, so it's the odd one out.
